bug.author: raphael0202
bug.summary: Conflicting version of plac between setup.py and requirements.txt
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Bug</denchmark-h>
In , we ask for and in for . As <denchmark-link:https://pypi.python.org/pypi/plac>plac 0.9.6 is released</denchmark-link> , if we start by a then , we get a conflicting version error. As a side note, in requirements.txt we don't have a version requirement for ujson, but we do in setup.py (ujson>=1.35). It would be great to change this too. <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
spaCy Version Used: HEAD
